about_the_game:
LightSup! is a couch-action co-op game for 1-4 players with rogue-lite elements where you play as adventurers encounter ferocious monsters crawling from the Eclipse Dungeons. Prepare your weapons and protect the Altar of Light at any cost, or the world will be doomed into darkness forever.





Experience with the ever-changing challenges of randomly generated overwhelming encounters; environments, monsters, events, weapons, and rewards. Carefully time your cooperation to save the world from darkness. The stronger you get, the more serious threats to keep your hands tied.



Perform a rite to the Sacred Altar that shall illuminate your path and shield your companions from the horde of creatures that emerge during the darkest days of Eclipseia.




Be cautious not to harm your friends with friendly fire while dealing with overwhelming situations unless that's something you enjoy witnessing!




Encounter the set of twisted events that will turn your unique expedition, crafting unique experiences on every journey with distinct encounters and challenges.




Battle against the powerful bosses who wield power over minions. Break the chain of darkness and free the villages, restoring the once-peaceful realms.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Cooperative Friendly Fire Battle: elevate the game situations to be more chaotic
  • Unique Characters & Abilities: strategize team synergy with several characters suitable to the challenges
  • Random Side-Quest: accept aside challenges that come with rewards toward the goal.
  • Rogue-lite element: randomized environments, monsters, quests, weapons, and rewards.
  • Nightmare Cards: 40 twist events mark every expedition to be different encounters.
  • Party Perks & Booster: build up randomized unique party boosters that will shape the team differently on every expedition.
  • The Altars of Light: get blessed, lighten the path, and give your party the to overcome challenges.
  • Unlock & Upgrade: Discover better gear and new characters. Boost character and team strength. Experiment with build modifiers to vanquish the shadows.

Note:

To enjoy local multiplayer, you'll need at least 1 keyboard and mouse, and up to 3 game controllers. Alternatively, you can also play with 4 game controllers. This means you can use Steam Remote Play to enjoy gaming sessions with your friends on Steam.
